ta.title: දේශබන්දුගේ ඉල්ලීමක් ප්‍රතික්ෂේප වෙයි
body_lines: தேர்வில் நிபுணர் கோட்டை மாஜிஸ்திரேட் நிலபுல் லங்காபுராவுக்கு இன்று (20) வரவழைக்கப்பட்டார்.

en.title: Deshabandu's request rejected
body_lines: Former Inspector General of IGP Deshaband Tennakoon has been rejected to prevent his arrest and released on an expenditure.
The Expert on the Examination was summoned to the Fort Magistrate Nilapulle Lankapura today (20).
